subject: Links Count and Access
msgSnippet: In my Httpunit Test : I have only one  in my Response. When I do response.getlinks()[0] or When I do response.getlinks()[1] I do not get
messageBody:
In my Httpunit Test :

I have only one <a href="aaaaa.jsp"> in my Response.

When I do
response.getlinks()[0]
or
When I do
response.getlinks()[1]
I do not get error but the same href that I had in page why?

I have many links that have same value such as

<a href="a.jsp">hi</a>

<a href="b.jsp">hi</a>
<a href="c.jsp">hi</a>

in same page.

How do I use the Link Information so that I can use each of them
separately without using the href= tag to find the link.

Suppose , I know only response.getlinkwith("Hi").
